rules_text:
[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don't control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
When this battle is defeated, at the beginning of the next end step, return it 
from your graveyard to the battlefield if you control five or more creatures.
